official_title: To provide financing incentives to promote energy efficiency in residential buildings, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Cranston-Gonzalez National Affordable Housing Act with respect to energy efficient mortgages. Directs the Secretaries of Housing and Urban Development and of Veterans Affairs to establish jointly an energy efficient mortgage pilot program to promote the purchase of new and existing energy efficient residential buildings and the installation of cost-effective improvements in existing residential buildings. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To provide financing incentives to promote energy efficiency in residential buildings, and for other purposes.
